name: Action: Vengeance
description:
Description:

The debut production of Knuckle Duster studio. Action: Vengeance is a dynamic first-person shooter set in Justice City.
The game is inspired by classic FPS games that put the fun of the game in the first place. In Action: Vengeance we play the role of a rebel "Glock".
His task is to eliminate corrupt security services that destroy the city, led by the authoritarian mayor of the city.

Story:

The action of the game takes place in a fictional city in the present day. The main character is "Glock", a rebel living in Justice City, where it started an anti-government uprising sparked by the authoritarian rule of the city's mayor.
The city government ordered the security forces to quell the riots.
A life and death struggle begins between "Glock" and the security services.

Mechanics:

Action: Vengeance is a dynamic first person shooter.
The game refers to the classic representatives of the genre, in the modern one audiovisual setting.
We must be careful not to die and control the health bar.
We recover lost equipment by collecting it on maps, or dropped by destroyed enemies.
We have a lot at our disposal weapons, including rifles, pistols, shotguns, sniper rifle and even grenades.
Each weapon uses a different type of bullets.

Game Modes:

Action: Vengeance offers a single player campaign, containing over a dozen different levels, with three levels of difficulty.

Technical Issues:

The game boasts an audiovisual setting. You may like the smoothness of the game and the lighting effects and style of the game, giving the atmosphere of a devastated place.
